Title: Setup Monorepo Structure
Description: Create root package.json with npm workspaces. Initialize apps/web (Next.js), apps/api (Python with uv), services/ingest (Python with uv). Create packages/shared for types. Setup .gitignore and .env.example files

Title: Docker Compose - Core Services
Description: PostgreSQL 16 container with persistent volume. Redis 7 container with persistence config. MinIO container with bucket setup. Qdrant container with persistent storage. Create docker-compose.yml and docker-compose.dev.yml. Document connection strings and ports

Title: Install and Configure Ollama
Description: Install Ollama on development machines. Pull llama2:7b model. Pull mistral:7b model. Test basic inference with both models. Document model selection rationale. Create troubleshooting guide

Title: PostgreSQL Schema Design
Description: Design ERD for all entities. Define relationships (User, Application, Document, Token). Plan indexes for multi-tenancy. Document isolation strategy. Review with team

Title: Setup CI/CD - Frontend
Description: GitHub Actions workflow for apps/web. Lint check (ESLint). Type check (TypeScript). Build verification. Run on PR and main branch

Title: Setup CI/CD - Backend Services
Description: GitHub Actions for apps/api. Python lint (ruff). Type check (mypy). Test execution (pytest). Similar workflow for services/ingest

Title: Initialize Next.js 15 Project
Description: Setup Next.js 15 with App Router. Configure TypeScript strict mode. Setup next.config.js. Configure path aliases (@/, @components, etc.). Create basic folder structure (app, components, lib)

Title: Setup Mantine 8
Description: Install all Mantine packages. Configure MantineProvider. Setup PostCSS config. Create theme.ts with custom colors. Test basic components (Button, Text, Card). Setup Tabler Icons

Title: Configure TypeORM in Next.js
Description: Install TypeORM and dependencies. Create DataSource configuration. Setup connection in API routes. Create utils/db.ts for connection management. Test database connection. Setup for multi-tenancy

Title: Create TypeORM Entities - User
Description: User entity with decorators. Fields: id, email, password, role, createdAt. Add validation decorators. Create UserRepository. Write migration. Test CRUD operations

Title: Create TypeORM Entities - Application
Description: Application entity with decorators. Fields: id, name, description, systemPrompt. ManyToMany relation with User. OneToMany relations (Documents, Tokens). Write migration. Test relationships

Title: Create TypeORM Entities - Document
Description: Document entity with decorators. Fields: id, filename, status, applicationId, metadata. ManyToOne relation to Application. Status enum (PENDING, PROCESSING, INDEXED, FAILED). Write migration

Title: Create TypeORM Entities - Token
Description: Token entity with decorators. Fields: id, tokenHash, applicationId, lastUsedAt. ManyToOne relation to Application. Expiration logic. Write migration

Title: Setup Iron Session
Description: Install iron-session. Create session configuration. Define session data types. Create getSession() utility. Create withAuth() middleware. Test session encryption

Title: Implement Password Hashing
Description: Install bcrypt. Create hashPassword() utility. Create comparePassword() utility. Set salt rounds to 12. Write unit tests

Title: Initialize FastAPI Project
Description: Setup FastAPI with uv. Create pyproject.toml. Configure project structure (routers, models, utils). Setup main.py with app factory. Configure CORS. Test basic endpoint

Title: FastAPI Environment Configuration
Description: Install pydantic-settings. Create settings.py with env validation. Database connection strings. Redis connection. Qdrant connection. Ollama endpoint. Test configuration loading

Title: Setup Qdrant Client
Description: Install qdrant-client. Create qdrant.py client wrapper. Connection configuration. Health check function. Collection creation utility. Test connection

Title: Setup Ollama Integration
Description: Install ollama Python client. Create ollama.py wrapper. Test connection to local Ollama. Test inference with llama2. Test inference with mistral. Document response formats

Title: Build Registration API Route
Description: POST /api/auth/register. Validate email and password with Zod. Check for duplicate email. Hash password with bcrypt. Create user in database. Create session. Return success response

Title: Build Login API Route
Description: POST /api/auth/login. Validate credentials. Compare password hash. Create Iron Session. Set session cookie. Return user data (without password)

Title: Build Logout API Route
Description: POST /api/auth/logout. Destroy Iron Session. Clear cookie. Return success

Title: Create Auth Middleware
Description: Check session exists. Validate session data. Attach user to request context. Handle expired sessions. Redirect unauthorized requests

Title: Build Login Page UI
Description: Create /login route. Mantine form with email/password. Form validation with Zod. Error message display. Loading state. Redirect to dashboard on success

Title: Build Registration Page UI
Description: Create /register route. Multi-field form (name, email, password, confirm). Password strength indicator. Form validation. Success message. Redirect to login

Title: Create Dashboard Layout
Description: Protected route wrapper. Sidebar navigation with Mantine. Header with user menu. Application switcher component. Responsive design. Logout button

Title: Build User Management Page (Admin)
Description: List all users in Mantine Table. Search and filter functionality. Pagination. Role badges (Admin, User). Edit and delete actions

Title: Create User API - Admin only
Description: POST /api/users (create user). GET /api/users (list users). PUT /api/users/:id (update user). DELETE /api/users/:id (soft delete). Admin role verification

Title: Build Applications List Page
Description: GET /api/applications (user's apps only). Card view with Mantine Grid. Show app name, description, doc count. Create new application button. Filter by user access

Title: Create Application Form
Description: Modal with Mantine Form. Fields: name, description, system prompt. Zod validation. Rich text editor for system prompt. User assignment multiselect

Title: API - Create Application
Description: POST /api/applications. Validate input. Create Application entity. Assign creator as maintainer. Create Qdrant collection (app_{id}_docs). Create MinIO folder (app-{id}/). Return created application

Title: API - Get User's Applications
Description: GET /api/applications. Query with TypeORM relations. Filter by user access (many-to-many). Include document counts. Include token counts. Return application list

Title: API - Update Application
Description: PUT /api/applications/:id. Verify user has access. Update name, description, system prompt. Update user assignments. Return updated application

Title: Build Application Detail Page
Description: Show application overview. Document list. Token list. System prompt display/edit. Usage statistics placeholder. Settings section

Title: Application Switcher Component
Description: Dropdown in header (Mantine Select). List user's applications. Switch active application. Store in localStorage + context. Update UI when switched

Title: Multi-Tenancy Verification Test
Description: Test user A cannot access user B's apps. Test application ID filtering in queries. Test Qdrant collection isolation. Test MinIO path isolation. Document test results

Title: Setup MinIO Client
Description: Install @aws-sdk/client-s3. Create minioClient.ts wrapper. Upload utility function. Download utility function. Pre-signed URL generation. Test upload/download

Title: File Validation Utilities
Description: MIME type checking. File size limit (20MB). Extension whitelist (.pdf, .docx, .txt, .md). Create validation schemas with Zod. Error messages

Title: Build Document Upload Page
Description: Mantine Dropzone component. Drag & drop support. File preview list. Upload progress indicator. Multi-file upload support. Error handling UI

Title: API - Upload Document
Description: POST /api/documents. Verify user has app access. Validate file type and size. Generate unique filename. Upload to MinIO (app-{id}/documents/). Create Document entity with applicationId. Enqueue processing job. Return document metadata

Title: Build Documents List Page
Description: Mantine Table with documents. Filter by current application only. Status badges (PENDING, PROCESSING, INDEXED, FAILED). Search by filename. Sort by upload date. Delete button. Download button

Title: API - Get Application Documents
Description: GET /api/documents?applicationId={id}. Verify user access to application. Query with TypeORM where clause. Filter by applicationId (multi-tenant!). Return documents with metadata

Title: API - Delete Document
Description: DELETE /api/documents/:id. Verify user access to document's application. Delete from MinIO. Delete from database. Enqueue vector cleanup job. Return success

Title: Setup Redis Job Queue (Frontend)
Description: Install ioredis and bullmq. Create queue instance. Job schema definitions. Connection configuration. Test enqueue

Title: Document Processing Job Producer
Description: Create job on document upload. Job payload: { documentId, applicationId, filename }. Priority configuration. Retry settings (3 attempts). Store job ID in Document entity

Title: Job Status Polling
Description: Create useDocumentStatus hook. Poll job status every 5 seconds. Update UI on status change. Stop polling when complete/failed. Display error messages

Title: Initialize Ingest Service
Description: Setup Python project with uv. Create pyproject.toml. Install dependencies (PyMuPDF, python-docx, etc.). Create folder structure. Setup logging with loguru. Test imports

Title: Setup Redis Queue Worker
Description: Install redis and rq. Create worker.py entrypoint. Configure Redis connection. Queue listener setup. Job handler registration. Error handling

Title: PostgreSQL Connection (Ingest)
Description: Install asyncpg. Create database connection utility. Query document by ID. Update document status. Connection pooling. Test queries

Title: MinIO Client (Ingest)
Description: Install boto3 or minio. Create MinIO client wrapper. Download file utility. Error handling. Test download from app-{id}/ path

Title: PDF Text Extraction
Description: Install PyMuPDF (fitz). Extract text from PDF pages. Handle encrypted PDFs. Extract metadata (page count, etc.). Return structured text data. Unit tests

Title: OCR for Scanned PDFs
Description: Install pytesseract and pdf2image. Detect if PDF needs OCR (no extractable text). Convert PDF pages to images. Run Tesseract OCR. Combine with extracted text. Error handling

Title: DOCX Text Extraction
Description: Install python-docx. Extract paragraphs and text. Handle tables. Extract metadata. Return structured text. Unit tests

Title: TXT/MD File Processing
Description: Encoding detection with chardet. Read text files. Parse markdown (optional). Return structured text. Unit tests

Title: Unified Document Parser
Description: Factory pattern for file types. Route to appropriate parser. Consistent output format. Error handling for unsupported types. Logging

Title: Text Chunking Implementation
Description: Install langchain-text-splitters. Configure RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter. Chunk size: 512 tokens. Overlap: 50 tokens. Preserve paragraph boundaries. Return chunks with metadata

Title: Setup Embedding Model
Description: Install sentence-transformers. Load all-MiniLM-L6-v2 model. GPU acceleration if available. Model caching. Test embedding generation

Title: Generate Embeddings for Chunks
Description: Batch process chunks. Generate 384-dim vectors. Include metadata (documentId, page, position). Error handling. Progress logging

Title: Qdrant Integration (Ingest)
Description: Install qdrant-client. Connect to Qdrant. Create collection if not exists (app_{id}_docs). Configure vector params. Test connection

Title: Upsert Vectors to Qdrant
Description: Batch upsert chunks to collection. Point ID generation strategy. Include payload (text, metadata). Per-application collection (multi-tenant!). Error handling. Confirm upload

Title: Main Processing Job Handler
Description: Fetch document from DB (with applicationId). Download file from MinIO. Parse document â†’ Chunk â†’ Embed. Upsert to Qdrant (correct collection!). Update Document status to INDEXED. Error handling â†’ status FAILED. Log processing time

Title: Job Retry Logic
Description: Exponential backoff. Max 3 retry attempts. Different handling for different errors. Update failure reasons in DB. Dead letter queue for manual review

Title: Processing Progress Updates
Description: Update job progress (0-100%). Store current step (extracting, chunking, embedding). Update Document metadata. Log to database

Title: Token Management API
Description: POST /api/tokens (create for application). GET /api/tokens?applicationId={id}. DELETE /api/tokens/:id (revoke). Generate random token with nanoid. Hash with SHA-256 before storing. Show plaintext only once. Verify user has app access

Title: Token Management UI
Description: Tokens list page per application. Create token button. Show token once modal (copy to clipboard). Revoke token confirmation. Last used timestamp. Mantine components

Title: FastAPI Token Authentication
Description: Extract Bearer token from header. Hash token with SHA-256. Query Token entity. Verify token exists and not expired. Get associated Application. Dependency injection for routes. Return 401 if invalid

Title: Query Request Model
Description: Create Pydantic model for /query. Fields: query (text), top_k (int), temperature (float). Validation rules. Optional parameters. Response model

Title: Query Embedding Generation
Description: Reuse same embedding model as ingestion. Generate embedding for user query. Normalize vector. Error handling

Title: Vector Search in Qdrant
Description: Search in app-specific collection (multi-tenant!). Use query embedding. Top-k retrieval (default k=5). Similarity score threshold. Return chunks with metadata. Handle empty results

Title: Context Assembly for LLM
Description: Format retrieved chunks into context. Inject application's system prompt. Build messages array for Ollama. Token counting. Truncate if exceeds context window. Log context size

Title: LLM Inference with Ollama
Description: Call Ollama API with context. Model selection from Application config. Temperature and max_tokens configuration. Parse response. Error handling (timeout, model unavailable). Log inference time

Title: POST /v1/query Endpoint
Description: Validate token â†’ get Application. Generate query embedding. Search app's Qdrant collection. Assemble context with system prompt. Call Ollama. Format response with sources. Return { answer, sources, metadata }. Update token last_used_at

Title: Source Citations in Response
Description: Include retrieved chunk text. Document references (filename, page). Relevance scores. Proper formatting. Return as part of response

Title: Query Interface UI
Description: Text input for question (Mantine Textarea). Submit button with loading state. Model selection dropdown. Temperature slider. Display response with formatting. Show thinking/loading animation

Title: Display Source Citations UI
Description: Accordion for sources (Mantine). Show document name and page. Display chunk text. Relevance score badge. Link to document (if applicable)

Title: Query History
Description: Store queries in database (optional). Display past queries. Re-run query button. Filter by application. Pagination

Title: Health Check Endpoint
Description: GET /v1/health. Check Ollama connectivity. Check Qdrant connectivity. Check Redis connectivity. Return status and versions

Title: API Documentation
Description: FastAPI auto-generates /docs. Add descriptions to endpoints. Add request/response examples. Document authentication. Document error codes

Title: Multi-Tenancy Isolation Tests
Description: Create 2 test applications. Upload same document to both. Verify separate Qdrant collections. Query both apps - no cross-contamination. Verify MinIO path isolation. Document test results

Title: End-to-End Test - Document Flow
Description: Create user and application. Upload PDF document. Wait for processing (INDEXED status). Verify in Qdrant collection. Query document content. Verify response accuracy. Automated test script

Title: Token Authentication Tests
Description: Create token for app A. Try to use for app B (should fail). Revoked token test (should fail). Expired token test. Invalid token format test. Document security verification

Title: Error Handling Tests
Description: Upload unsupported file type. Upload oversized file. Query with invalid token. Query non-existent application. Ollama unavailable scenario. Document all error paths

Title: Frontend Unit Tests
Description: Test auth utilities. Test form validations. Test API client functions. Test utility functions. 70%+ coverage goal

Title: Backend Unit Tests
Description: Test token hashing. Test embedding generation. Test chunking logic. Test Qdrant queries. 70%+ coverage goal

Title: Load Testing - Document Upload
Description: Simulate 10 concurrent uploads. Measure MinIO throughput. Monitor queue depth. Check for bottlenecks. Document results and limits

Title: Load Testing - RAG Queries
Description: Simulate 50 concurrent queries. Measure response times (p50, p95, p99). Test Ollama under load. Monitor Qdrant performance. Document performance characteristics

Title: Database Query Optimization
Description: Analyze slow queries. Add missing indexes. Optimize TypeORM relations loading. Test with larger dataset (1000+ documents). Document optimizations

Title: Error Logging & Monitoring Setup
Description: Structured JSON logging. Log levels (debug, info, warn, error). Correlation IDs across services. Error aggregation (Sentry optional). Log rotation

Title: Production Dockerfiles
Description: Multi-stage build for Next.js. Optimize image size. Security scanning. Non-root user. Health checks. Document build process

Title: Production Docker Compose
Description: Separate production config. Environment variable management. Volume persistence strategy. Network security. Resource limits. Backup configuration

Title: Environment Variables Setup
Description: Create .env.production.example. Document all required vars. Secrets management strategy. Validation on startup. Security review

Title: Database Migration Strategy
Description: Production migration workflow. Backup before migrate. Rollback plan. Zero-downtime migration guide. Test on staging

Title: Choose Deployment Platform
Description: Evaluate options (Railway, DigitalOcean, Render). Cost analysis. Performance comparison. Make decision and document. Setup account

Title: Deploy to Production
Description: Setup managed PostgreSQL. Setup managed Redis. Deploy containers. Configure domains. SSL/TLS setup. Test deployment

Title: Production Health Monitoring
Description: Uptime monitoring. Error rate tracking. Response time monitoring. Database connection pool. Alert setup (email/Slack)

Title: Backup & Recovery Setup
Description: PostgreSQL daily backups. MinIO backup strategy. Qdrant snapshots. Recovery testing. Document restore process

Title: Security Hardening
Description: Enable HTTPS only. Configure security headers. Rate limiting on API endpoints. Input sanitization review. Security audit checklist. Document security measures

Title: Production Smoke Tests
Description: Create account. Create application. Upload document. Wait for processing. Query document. Verify response. Test with multiple users

Title: User Guide - Getting Started
Description: How to create account. Creating first application. Uploading documents. Querying your knowledge base. Screenshots and examples

Title: Developer Setup Guide
Description: Prerequisites installation. Clone repository. Docker Compose setup. Environment variables. First run guide. Troubleshooting common issues

Title: API Documentation
Description: Complete API reference. Authentication guide. Request/response examples. Error codes reference. Rate limits. Python and JavaScript examples

Title: Architecture Documentation
Description: System architecture diagram. Multi-tenancy explanation. Data flow diagrams. Technology decisions log. Scaling considerations

Title: Deployment Guide
Description: Production deployment steps. Environment configuration. Monitoring setup. Backup/restore procedures. Scaling guide

Title: Contributing Guide
Description: Code style guidelines. Branch naming conventions. PR process. Testing requirements. Code review checklist

Title: Learning Logs Compilation
Description: Each team member writes "What I Learned". Challenges faced and solutions. Would-do-differently section. Tips for future contributors. Compile into blog posts

Title: README.md Polish
Description: Project overview. Key features. Quick start. Architecture summary. Screenshots. Links to detailed docs. Badges (build status, etc.)

Title: Demo Video Creation
Description: Screen recording of full workflow. Voiceover explanation. Show multi-tenancy. Show RAG in action. Upload to YouTube. Embed in README

Title: Performance Benchmarks Document
Description: Document upload speeds. Query response times. Concurrent user capacity. Resource usage metrics. Cost estimates

Title: UI/UX Polish
Description: Consistent spacing and alignment. Loading states everywhere. Error messages user-friendly. Empty states with guidance. Mobile responsiveness check. Dark mode support (optional)

Title: Input Validation Review
Description: Review all forms. Consistent error messages. Client + server validation. SQL injection prevention. XSS prevention. Document validation rules

Title: Performance Optimization
Description: Next.js bundle analysis. Lazy loading components. Image optimization. API response caching. Database query optimization. Document improvements

Title: Accessibility Audit
Description: Keyboard navigation. Screen reader testing. Color contrast checking. ARIA labels. Focus management. Document findings

Title: Error Recovery Flows
Description: Handle failed uploads gracefully. Retry failed processing. Recover from Ollama downtime. Database connection failures. Clear user guidance

Title: Beta Testing
Description: Invite 5-10 external users. Collect feedback. Monitor for errors. Track usage patterns. Document issues

Title: Fix Critical Beta Issues
Description: Prioritize feedback. Fix blocking bugs. Improve unclear UX. Performance issues. Security concerns

Title: Launch Announcement
Description: Write launch post (dev.to, Medium). Share on Twitter/LinkedIn. Post in relevant communities. Create Product Hunt page. Prepare demo for inquiries

Title: ðŸŽ‰ Launch Celebration
Description: Deploy to production. Monitor for 24 hours. Team retrospective meeting. Celebrate achievements. Plan next features. Share learnings

Title: Streaming Query Responses
Description: Implement SSE in FastAPI. Stream Ollama responses. Update UI progressively. Better user experience for long queries

Title: Conversation History
Description: Store query context. Multi-turn conversations. Context management. Clear conversation button

Title: Advanced Document Types
Description: Support for images (OCR + vision models). Excel/CSV processing. PowerPoint presentations. Markdown with embedded images

Title: Fine-tune Custom Models
Description: Collect domain-specific data. Fine-tune Llama2 on user data. Deploy custom models per application. A/B testing different models

Title: SQL Report Generation
Description: Connect to user databases. Natural language to SQL. Generate reports from queries. Export to PDF/Excel

Title: API Rate Limiting
Description: Token-based rate limits. Per-application quotas. Usage tracking. Billing preparation

Title: Analytics Dashboard
Description: Query analytics per application. Most asked questions. Response quality metrics. Usage trends. Export reports

Title: Webhooks
Description: Notify on document processing complete. Notify on errors. Custom integrations. Webhook testing UI
